languages.text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single round.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}敌方远程攻击时，都会使用装备的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，立刻攻击随机的相邻敌人。此次攻击额外获得35%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}，此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能触发三次。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}敌方远程攻击时，都会使用装备的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，立刻攻击随机的相邻敌人。此次攻击额外获得35%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}，此效果每轮只能触发三次。

languages.text: Успешно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонившись{/g} от вражеской атаки дальнего боя, персонаж немедленно совершает одиночную атаку используемым {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием против случайного противника на соседней клетке. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} этой атаки составляют 35%, и она не может быть использована больше трех раз за один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Успешно уклонившись, персонаж немедленно совершает одиночную атаку используемым рукопашным оружием против случайного противника на соседней клетке. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} этой атаки составляют 35%. ! Может использоваться только друкари.

Успешно уклонившись, персонаж немедленно совершает одиночную атаку используемым рукопашным оружием против случайного противника на соседней клетке. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} этой атаки составляют 35%. ! Может использоваться только друкари.

languages.text: 使用者が敵の遠距離攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたびに、直ちに装備している{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で隣接するランダムな敵に単体攻撃を行う。この攻撃では +35%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}が生じ、1ラウンドで3回だけ実行可能。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵の遠距離攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g}するたびに、直ちに装備している{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で隣接するランダムな敵に単体攻撃を行う。この攻撃では +35%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}パリィ減少{/g}が生じ、1ラウンドで3回だけ実行可能。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque a distancia del enemigo, inmediatamente lanza un ataque con su arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} equipada contra un enemigo adyacente. El ataque tiene +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}, pero solo puede ejecutarse un máximo de tres veces por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque a distancia del enemigo, inmediatamente lanza un ataque con su arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} equipada contra un enemigo adyacente. El ataque tiene +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}, pero solo puede ejecutarse un máximo de tres veces por asalto.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einem feindlichen Fernkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, vollzieht er sofort einen Angriff mit der ausgerüsteten {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} auf einen zufälligen angrenzenden Feind. Dieser Angriff hat +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} und kann in einer einzigen Runde nur drei Mal ausgeführt werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einem feindlichen Fernkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, vollzieht er sofort einen einzelnen Angriff mit der ausgerüsteten {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} auf einen zufälligen angrenzenden Feind. Dieser Angriff hat +35 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g} und kann in einer einzigen Runde nur drei Mal ausgeführt werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque à distance ennemie, il lance immédiatement une attaque unique contre un ennemi adjacent aléatoire à l'aide de l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dont il est équipé. Cette attaque ne peut être effectuée que 3 fois au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} et bénéficie de +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur esquive une attaque, il lance immédiatement contre un ennemi adjacent aléatoire une attaque ponctuelle à l'aide de l'arme de mêlée dont il est équipé. Cette attaque bénéficie de +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}. ! Uniquement utilisable par les Drukhari.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque à distance ennemie, il lance immédiatement une attaque unique contre un ennemi adjacent aléatoire à l'aide de l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dont il est équipé. Cette attaque ne peut être effectuée que 3 fois au cours d'un même round et bénéficie de +35 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}.
